Manahau barge: Inquiry launched after vessel runs aground on Westport beach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/manahau-barge-inquiry-launched-after-vessel-runs-aground-on-westport-beach/YOUH4ALSBNDOTIYM4JWDMJ5WWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/manahau-barge-inquiry-launched-after-vessel-runs-aground-on-westport-beach/YOUH4ALSBNDOTIYM4JWDMJ5WWU/ David WilliamsThe vessel had been anchored offshore for the past week, unable to come into port. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 04:00:58 +0000 The Manahau has run aground at Carters Beach, Westport. Photo / Marlene Coleman, Facebook
Transport Minister Simeon Brown unveils $32.9b National Land Transport Programme https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/transport-minister-simeon-brown-set-to-release-third-year-national-land-transport-programme/QXSVUSLCHBAT7AIATIEHGJ3O3M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/transport-minister-simeon-brown-set-to-release-third-year-national-land-transport-programme/QXSVUSLCHBAT7AIATIEHGJ3O3M/ The plan sets out how NZTA will spend its funding to improve and maintain the network. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 03:41:00 +0000 Transport Minister Simeon Brown unveils the $32.9b National Land Transport Programme. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Shane Jones said Judith Collins ‘sought to school me’ after judge comments, to change approach https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/shane-jones-said-judith-collins-sought-to-school-me-after-judge-comments-to-change-approach/XSM2ITOJ5NE6ZIJKEN57XHTIFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/shane-jones-said-judith-collins-sought-to-school-me-after-judge-comments-to-change-approach/XSM2ITOJ5NE6ZIJKEN57XHTIFA/ Jamie Ensor"The principle of comity really requires someone like me to put a stone on my tongue." Mon, 02 Sep 2024 03:33:09 +0000 NZ First MP Shane Jones. Photo / NZME
Herald afternoon quiz: September 2 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/herald-afternoon-quiz-september-2/MMN62M2ETFEIXBCAV7QVJRWRHY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/herald-afternoon-quiz-september-2/MMN62M2ETFEIXBCAV7QVJRWRHY/ Test your knowledge with the Herald's afternoon quiz. Northland man with disability assaulted over Woolworths mobility parking space https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-man-with-disability-assaulted-over-woolworths-mobility-parking-space/MSMJFFSCCJHRFI2DBF4WWK56HM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/northland-man-with-disability-assaulted-over-woolworths-mobility-parking-space/MSMJFFSCCJHRFI2DBF4WWK56HM/ The man is welcoming an increase in fines for people who abuse mobility parking spaces. Photo / Peter de Graaf, RNZ

Rescue at Auckland’s Muriwai Beach: Lifeguards rescue two stranded girls from rocky outpost https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-aucklands-muriwai-beach-lifeguards-rescue-two-stranded-girls-from-rocky-outpost/3TUCCC56J5F5JHTNNU3VOXAJ54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-aucklands-muriwai-beach-lifeguards-rescue-two-stranded-girls-from-rocky-outpost/3TUCCC56J5F5JHTNNU3VOXAJ54/ Rescuers were able to guide the pair along the rocks to safety rather than use a jetski.
